short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The MtG deck building companion for the 'BuildAndBrew.online' multiverse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
ALPHA VERSION!

buildandbrew.online is the first holistic deck-building companion that's always at your side(-bar) to help you sort newly discovered cards. We aim to speed up the card search and aggregation process to give deck builders more time to brew!

Download this browser-extension now and check out all your favorite MTG-related sites!

If you experience any trouble or bugs, let us know! We're also happy about feature requests and ensure you we've got a plethora of ideas on our own!
long.de:
ALPHA VERSION!
Holistic MtG deck building companion for the "BuildAndBrew.online" editor. On supported websites, a sidebar opens where images, links and names of cards can be dragged and dropped onto in order to add the card to the targeted deck.
